entry.title: PDA here, PDA there, PDA everywhere!!!!
entry.summary:
Author: crappybowlsoframen

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,613Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: "Oh my God," Allison groaned. "You're worse than my grandparents.""Correction," Lydia said. "They're worse than any couple in the history of ever."Stiles pouted. "You guys are just mad because we’re in love.""Mad? No, I'm traumatized," Scott said. "I just saw Derek Hale smile.""Not just smile," Erica said, eyes wide with betrayal. "He giggled."The pack stared at Derek. He just smirked and pulled Stiles in for another disgustingly soft kiss.

entry.title: serve me lemonade
entry.summary:
Author: endversed

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,135Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 3

Summary: “Do not hit on our professor,” Lydia says. “Technically,” Stiles starts to point out, “he’s just our professor’s friend.” “Technically,” she purses her mouth primly around the retort, “he’s old enough to be your father.” Instantly, Stiles catches his tongue between his teeth. He can feel his nose scrunching up with the utter glee of his smile. “I know,” he breathes. “Isn’t it awesome?”  Stiles is a law student with a thing for older men. Derek is the middle-aged divorcee he wants to climb like a tree.

entry.title: The Alpha's List
entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,392Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 177

Summary: In the Game of Love, he Made the Rules. The Honorable Derek Hale, Marquis of Redbridge.He is aristocratic, excessively handsome, excessively wealthy, aloof, reserved, arrogant and the powerful Alpha of one of the most renowned packs in the country. He has been an elusive prize for years, the target of desperate society Omega and their matchmaking mothers. But he is not swayed by flirtatious smiles and fine looks, social climbers and fortune hunters. He wants more.When his lack of an Omega causes concern to his mother, uncle and pack a remedy is suggested in the form of a suitable match. Derek draws up a list of qualifications and attributes for his future mate. Can any Omega hope to win the heart of such a demanding bachelor and cynic?Stiles Stilinski the Omega son of a clergyman can only try his best. The Marquis is not sure whether he has discovered the perfect Omega… Or the been the victim of a cruel hoax.

entry.title: The Thing About The Truth
entry.summary:
Author: MoonWolfBlues

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,419Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 16

Summary: "Oh come on, don't wake him.""Yeah Derek, I thought we all agreed to let him rest."Stiles feels more than hears the growling in response to Erica and Allison's teasing.He frowns when the warm pillow under his head starts to move. "Ugghhh," he groans - not whines, he definitely doesn't whine, no sir-ee."Oh come on Derek, look what you've done."Stiles feels another growl, this time it was more of a rumble underneath him, but the pillow did in fact stop moving.Slowly, Stiles blinks his eyes open to find his face squished up against black cotton. There was only one person in the pack who religiously wore black like any sort of color could poison them.Derek.He'd fallen asleep on Derek."Oh my god." He whisper shouts.Or, the au where the Hale Pack is back together in Beacon Hills for summer break after their Freshmen Year of college and Stiles is hit with a truth spell that makes it impossible for him to shut up (even more so than usual). Embarrassing hijinks ensue.

entry.title: Magical "Girl" 101 (A Guide by Stiles Stilinski)
entry.summary:
Author: Cute_Magical

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,181Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 67

Summary: When Stiles had been kicked out of the pack, he expected many things to happen. However, finding a magic book, gaining both a small and large flying magical companion, and a whole lot of unwanted responsibilities were not any of those things.Unlikely allies, magical abilities, newfound strength, and budding new relationships come together in Stiles's adventure of collecting clow cards.Oh, and he also gets rich… mostly through credit card fraud.You do not have to know Cardcaptor Sakura to read this fic. Updates weeklyy/Bi-weekly possibly sooner.

entry.title: Morning Dew
entry.summary:
Author: Samandiriel (kyra516)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,978Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 4

Summary: Stiles had always been a bit of an odd bunny compared to his peers. He had this sense of adventure and the need to explore! His father said he got most of it from his late mother. His father also called it recklessness and lack of self-preservation. Most of the time, Stiles just dismissed his father as being plain wrong.Today however? Today he reckoned his father was completely and truly right in his judgement. Because today, Stiles had made the most reckless and stupid decision of his life. You see, Stiles had the brilliant idea of venturing into wolf lands to do some gathering, and so here he was, on the other side of the river, in the unknown lands that no bunny before him had dared to venture into. What could possibly go wrong?It was all Jackson's fault anyway.  ---The story is finished and will be fully published either by me, or in case of my death, by my friend. You will not be left hanging. ---

entry.title: On thin ice
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,003Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Stiles Stilinski has spent his life running—from places, from people, from memories he’d rather bury. But no matter how much he tries to disappear, Derek Hale is always there, dragging him back to reality with sharp words and an infuriating presence.Derek has never understood why Stiles hates him so much, but after years of biting remarks and silent battles, he’s stopped caring. Or at least, that’s what he tells himself.But when buried secrets begin to surface and the fine line between rivalry and obsession blurs, Stiles and Derek realize that maybe what exists between them was never just hatred.And the harder they try to pull away, the more they seem to be drawn into something dangerous—where desire and pain walk hand in hand.

entry.summary:
Author: sifshadowheart

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 61,355Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 1,156

Summary: Harry and his Circle were having a nice relaxing evening at home when out of nowhere, two of their kids (they were adults, well versed and set in their dynamics, but they'd always be Harry's kids) were snatched away in a Soul Scream.It's from a tiny little speck on the Earth map called Beacon Hills, California.The Submissive in distress? None other than one Stiles Stilinski, resident trouble-magnet and pain-in-the-ass, who'd had his inheritance suppressed until enough trauma and sheer need and pain had shattered the seals he was under.And unleashed something inside of him that was never meant to see the light of day.Or the love of a Circle of his very own.

entry.title: Stiles Come Home
entry.summary:
Author: SpaceAce281990

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 207,616Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 654

Summary: Stiles was kidnapped from the hospital, hours after being born. He was raised by a misguided spark who thought he was hers and then taken away and placed in foster care. Sheriff John Stilinski had never stopped looking for his son, efforts doubling once his wife died and his son's case went cold. When he gets the call that the woman who had stolen his son had come forward, confessed, and he provides what he needs to prove that Stiles is his son, he is elated, emotional, and scared. What had his son went through all of those years and could he work to be the father he had always wanted to be?And could he answer Stiles' first question. "Are you Batman?"

entry.title: Red Riding
entry.summary:
Author: MitzyMaeFae

Author: SuperCraig96

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 102,507Chapters: 45/?Kudos: 32

Summary: Everyone in Scott's circle had already found their soulmate: Stiles with Derek, Allison with Isaac… only he was alone. Scott was happy for his friends, especially for Stiles, but he felt lonely. Every day, he stared at the two letters, the initials of his soulmate, whom he didn't know: L and A, hoping to finally meet him. (Soulmate AU)

entry.title: The Alpha and The Spark
entry.summary:
Author: Angeleyz4ever

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 54,335Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 20

Summary: FBI Agent Stiles Stilinski's special team was supposed to save a old world werewolf pack that was reported to be wiped out by hunters. Yet when they arrive the camp becomes all out chaos.Stiles and his two charges are lucky to make it out alive. So he messages the only person he can trust that would be able to help him... his Sourwolf. Derek Hale races to find Stiles so they can flee across country, taking their charges to the only place they know they can keep them safe. Even when Stiles is wanted by the FBI and the resident Alpha is throwing a tantrum.Can they stop an all out war and how is it the FBI has turned on Stiles? At the end of the day, can Stiles and Derek save everyone and themselves while trying to make a life for themselves together or will they die trying?
